text: Nāvu malak‌gaḷoḍane, ‘‘ādamarige sāṣṭāṅgaveragiri’’ endāga avaru sāṣṭāṅgaveragidaru – ādare iblīsana horatu. Avanu jinn‌gaḷa sālige sēriddanu mattu avanu tanna oḍeyana ādēśavannu mīri naḍedanu. Avanu nim'ma śatruvāgiruvāga nīvēnu, nannannu biṭṭu, avanannu hāgū avana santatiyannu nim'ma pōṣakarāgisikoḷḷuvirā? Akramigaḷige bahaḷa keṭṭa phala sigalide
